ygData.subject: Re: Price Fixing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Short attention span theater, two tickets reserved for the above quoted individuals. (shrug) I enjoy this game a lot, and that means I (gasp, here s the
ygData.messageBody:
--- Jason Coan <COANJ@...> wrote:
>> heh, I didn't even finish reading it myself...., but
>> I think I'm going to drop my prices further just to
>> piss this guy off even more

> I didn't even make it through half of this message,
> but man can't you find something better to put all
> that energy into?

Short attention span theater, two tickets reserved for the above quoted
individuals.

(shrug) I enjoy this game a lot, and that means I (gasp, here's the
kicker boys) think about it. Thoughts are more than single sentence
statements.

But go ahead and flame, you will anyway. We'll see who's right in
another month or two; I predict that servers with uber smiths charging
low prices will see only a few smiths left after a few weeks. If you
want the validating evidence as to this position, read that post you
lost interest in and wandering off to watch WWF in the middle of.

It's really a shame, I was looking forward to playing a smith too; but
why should I bother if I'll only make a gold over costs? I continue,
however, to hold out hope that Verdant will fix the trade skills, and
make them work as they should (platemail, weaponsmithing, cloth armor,
etc...)

===
:D
Dave's World
-No matter where you go, there you are-
"People will believe a lie either because they want to
believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
